Author: mrvllousdspair
Text: literally omfg i’ve never even been skinny myself and i’m overweight and have large boobs and i just generally hate my body, but it got a lot lot worse after that comment and god your bf acc sounds like a damn jerk and i feel like suffocating him with my overweight stomach. i hate when ppl say there’s no such thing as thin privilege or fatphobia bc it’s literally everywhere!!!!

Author: littlesunbabe
Text: YES. My bf constantly is talking about how much he loves my body and how “small/tiny” I am and how he preferred small boobs too!! He takes it even further though and puts down other body types in a really fatphobic sense saying things like “big boobs just mean the girl is overweight” and it really fuels the Ed fire that keeps me the size I am. Like it really validated/justified my whole ass eating disorder. Thin privilege and fatphobia are real as fuck it’s no wonder were out here desperately trying to control our weight.
